head.title: World Business Briefing | Europe: European Union: Utility Merger

hedline.hl1: World Business Briefing | Europe: European Union: Utility Merger

abstract.p: European Commission decides that secondary investigation is needed in Electricite de France's attempt to buy Spanish electricity company Hidroelectrica del Cantabrico SA (S)

block.p: The European Commission decided that a secondary investigation is needed in Electricité de France's attempt to buy a Spanish electricity company, Hidroeléctrica del Cantábrico S.A. The competition commissioner, Mario Monti, said the first phase of the investigation determined that the proposed acquisition ''poses serious concerns that justify today's decision to start a full investigation.'' Electricité de France, which made the offer for Cantábrico through a partly owned subsidiary, Energie Baden-Württemberg, is the largest electricity producer in Europe and the commission is concerned about its dominance in the industry.
